data.text: @NYCHealthCommr @nycgov @NYCMayor Recognize all COVID RECOVERED in private sector mandates.  Proof via documented antibody test is sufficient for every other mandatory vaccine and should be no different for this.  Coercing the already protected into a vaccine is wrong. https://t.co/kGAJKbLKGD

@NYCHealthCommr @nycgov @NYCMayor You mean the mutagenic Molnupiravir available under EUA?
https://t.co/Ql7b5hMBtY
@NYCHealthCommr @NYCMayor @nycgov Treatments have been around for at least a year.  NOW you are talking about them?  Too busy pushing so-called vaccines that don’t work.
@NYCHealthCommr @Saucy_Sis @nycgov @NYCMayor I’m not taking ANY PILLS! Bad enough I’ve taken 3 vaccines

@NYCHealthCommr @NYCMayor @nycgov Effective treatments, vaccines and boosters, natural immunities, it’s almost like the pandemic is over.  You people are all IRRELEVANT now, you’ve made yourselves so.

@NYCHealthCommr @nycgov @NYCMayor If we have treatments then why the hell do we have these ridiculous mandates in NYC? 
End mandates now!!
@NYCHealthCommr @nycgov @NYCMayor What about those who have no health insurance?! Are the pills affordable?! Not everyone has health insurance !
